snippet.title: Bubsy: The Woolies Strike Back - PlayStation 4 Gameplay
snippet.description:
Twenty years after the launch of the worst PSone game ever made, Bubsy got a new game in 2017 for PC and PlayStation 4. This particular game was released some time before Black Forest Games, who previously developed the well-received Giana Sisters: Twisted Dreams, was acquired by THQ Nordic and went on to remake both Destroy All Humans 1 and 2. Predictably, Bubsy's revival was poorly received, with the game holding a Metacritic score of 45, while the Steam user reviews are mostly mixed.

At least you can finally shut his gob in the options this time.

Bubsy: The Woolies Strike Back, Accolade (C) Atari
Originally published by BillionSoft under the Accolade name.
Also available on Steam and GOG.com

#bubsy #bubsybobcat #bubsywooliesstrikeback #accolade #billionsoft #blackforestgames #ps4 #playstation4
